a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Extrapolated change in plastic fate, 1980 to 2050
Estimated historic trends in global plastic disposal method (from 1980 to 2015) with extrapolation of past
rates of change through to 2050. This gives some indicate of future scenarios based on continued change
rates, but should not be directly interpreted as future projections (which cannot assume consistent change
